dc:title: On Pilgrimage - January 1956
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Reviews the past year in terms of vocations, marriages and births, including Tamar's sixth child. Details Christmas celebrations and notes "the duty of delight." Remembers those who have died. Repeats the necessity to work for peace and disarmament "in season and out of season."
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 697 1956-01-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
